title: WHAT IS THE ADDRESS FOR THE RESTAURANT- TWO FAT LADIES OVER A SIMMERING POT- ARTICLE IN PAPER SHOWS FRONT OF RESTAURANT BUT GIVES NO PHYSICAL ADDRESS-THIS PLACE I HAVE TO TRY
text:
It's at 16th and Dawson in Wilmington.



Here's another story about the restaurant:
